document_name: Financial Sector (Climate-related Disclosures and Other Matters) Amendment Act 2021
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/NZL/2021/NZL-2021-10-28-Financial Sector (Climate-related Disclosures and Other Matters) Amendment Act 2021_daa5b09fa40095576e5df3388ad7e53b.pdf
document_description: This Act amends the Financial Markets Conduct Act 2013. It introduced mandatory reporting on climate-related risks for various entities, including equity and debt issuers listed on the New Zealand Stock Exchange.
